content.intro: Animio respects user privacy and is committed to protecting personal data and information related to pets. This policy describes how data is collected, used, and protected when using the Animio app.
content.data: Animio may collect: pet profile data (name, species/breed, age, sex, photos, notes), veterinary visit data, location if enabled, device technical data, and contact information if provided.
content.purpose: Collected data is used to manage pet profiles, show nearby veterinarians, send reminders and notifications, improve app quality and security, and provide user support.
content.legal: Data processing is based on: contract execution, consent for optional features, legitimate interest for security and improvement, and legal obligations.
content.sharing: Personal data is not sold. Shared only with providers such as Supabase, mapping services (Apple/Google Maps), or messaging services needed for app functionality.
content.retention: Data is retained for the time necessary to provide services and comply with legal obligations. Users may request data deletion at any time.
content.security: Communications between the app and server are secured via HTTPS/TLS, and technical and organizational measures are applied to protect data.
content.rights: Users have the right to access, modify, delete data, limit processing, object, request portability, or withdraw consent.
content.minors: The app is not intended for children under 14. Data of minors is not knowingly collected. Parents or guardians can request removal.
content.thirdparties: The app may integrate third-party services that handle data according to their own policies.
content.cookies: The mobile app does not use cookies. The website may use technical or analytical cookies, manageable via the browser.
content.contact: Data controller: Pablo Munoz – Email: pablo.munoz05@hotmail.com – Website: https://www.pablo-munoz.com
content.changes: This Privacy Policy may be updated periodically. Changes will be posted on this page.
